name: Tiny Settlers (llamaking, LlamaDev Games)
description:
Either for 1 or 2 Players

Use your culture's unique qualities to thrive on your new island home.

Created for the StartupCities Game Jam Controls

Left click and drag to move scree

Scroll wheel to zoom in and out

Credits

Programming - LlamaDev

Art - Sam Cook

Lofi Music - archive.org/details/LofiBeatsRadio2

Sound Effects - Kenny Assets
